    right="Feat 2"

>
[Inspire Competence](/Feats.aspx?ID=185) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 100 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[maestro muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You learn the [_inspire competence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=385) composition cantrip, which aids your allies’ skills.
name: Inspire Competence
